dialog.text: Hi, how are you? The seeker  feels curious about the supporter. The supporter should also ask how the seeker is doing.
Doing good. How are you?
Oh, I'm feeling really anxious recently. The seeker  feels anxious. The supporter should ask more details about the reason why the seeker is anxious.
I'm sorry to hear that, could you tell me more details?

The online course is too difficult for me. Our school started online course because of the Covid. But just can't focus on study when I'm doing the online course. The seeker  feels anxious because of the online course. The supporter could suggest the seeker to talk to the professor or join a study group.
I understand how you feel. I was also very anxious when I first started taking the online course. However, once I got used to it, it was very helpful in learning.
beam_texts: I understand how you feel. I was also very anxious when I first started taking the online course. However, once I got used to it, it was very helpful in learning.

dialog.text: I've tried to get used to it, but it's just not working out for me. I've tried taking breaks, but I can't focus for long. The seeker  feels anxious because of the online course. The supporter could tell the seeker to try different methods to focus on study.
I have found that different people learn in different ways. I am very organized and like to have everything in one place. You might be better off taking notes in a book. Is that something you can do?
beam_texts: I have found that different people learn in different ways. I am very organized and like to have everything in one place. You might be better off taking notes in a book. Is that something you can do?

dialog.text: I think that's a good idea. I usually take notes while I'm reading the book, but it's not very efficient. The seeker  feels anxious because of taking online course which is difficult to focus. The supporter could suggest the seeker to try different ways to learn and take notes.
I think taking notes in a book is a great idea! I use a notebook and a pen to write everything down. This way I can reference it anytime I need to.
beam_texts: I think taking notes in a book is a great idea! I use a notebook and a pen to write everything down. This way I can reference it anytime I need to.

dialog.text: That's a good idea too. I think I'll try that. The seeker  feels anxious because of the online course which is difficult to focus. The supporter could suggest the seeker to try different ways to learn and take notes.
I hope it helps!

It should. I'm feeling a lot more confident about this. The seeker  feels anxious about the online course. The supporter could suggest the seeker to try different methods to learn. The supporter could also say that the supporter also felt anxious when taking the online course.
That's great!
Thank you! The seeker  feels anxious about online course. The supporter could share some useful tips about how to focus on study when feeling anxious.
You're welcome!
